channel.title: Adding a Spec?
channel.description: Alright well Ive been making a server (317) And I added dclaws and stuff to my game but im not sure how to add specs to it. If you could help me itd be great help thanks. (Sorry if this isnt the right topic).

item.title: Adding a Spec?
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Jup I Can Help, I Cant Make It Hit 4 Though

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == *D-Claws Id* && specialAmount <= 49) { // D-claws specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == *D-Claws Id* && specialAmount >= 50) { // dclaws startAnimation(2890); AGSSpecial(); specialDamage = 20 + misc.random(50); specialAmount -= 50;

Also Add This

public void armadylSpecial() {
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == D-Claw ID) {
hitDiff = 65 + misc.random(10);
startAnimation(2890);
DDStimer = 0;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(70);
SpecialDelay -= 3;

If You Dont Know Were To Add Them… Dont As kMe!
